subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Lastings Milledge once again played a starring role in the finale of the Mets’ four-game series against the Cincinnati Red, hitting a two-run double that lifted the Mets to a victory.
snippet: Lastings Milledge once again played a starring role in the finale of the Mets’ four-game series against the Cincinnati Red, hitting a two-run double that lifted the Mets to a victory.
